info.author: Bellingcat
info.name: vk-url-scraper
info.summary: Scrape VK URLs to fetch info and media - python API or command line tool.

info.author: Bellingcat
info.name: vk-url-scraper
requires_dist: pycryptodomex (==3.17) ; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4"
urllib3 (==1.26.14) ; python_version >= "2.7" and python_version not in "3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5"
info.summary: Scrape VK URLs to fetch info and media - python API or command line tool.
